reviews.review: Good story and good multiplayer. Definitly worth it.
Muito divertido com amigos e gameplay otima!

İlk oyunun devamı niteliğinde olan Portal 2, sizi ilk oyundan -yanlış bilmiyorsam- 10.000 yıl sonrasına götürüyor. Uzun bir uykudan uyanıp tekrardan maceraya atılıyoruz. Özellikle oyunun sonu çok keyifli bitti. Portal 1'i oynadıysanız devam etmeyi unutmayın. Ayrıca başka bir arkadaşınızla oynayabileceğiniz Co-op modu bulunmakta. Puanım 10 üzerinden 8.
this game is challenging and the story is great
Лучшая после HL игра от Valve
Absolute Masterpiece, highly recommended to play with friends. Worth every penny
Игра для любителей не понимать, куда идти и чо делать
uno dei migliori giochi che abbia mai giocato

Otro juegazo de Valve super recomendado, una gran mejora respecto al anterior. La historia es una continuación del anterior así que personalmente recomiendo jugar al anterior, no obstante, se puede jugar a este perfectamente sin haber jugado al primero.

Contiene un modo cooperativo y un editor de salas, que le da al juego una vida enorme, a lo que se le suma el acceso a una gran base de datos con salas elaboradas por la comunidad. Sin duda, Portal 2 es una adquisición a la que se le puede sacar muchas horas de juego, al margen de la campaña principal y del modo cooperativo.
just a great game, the puzzles get progressivly harder, theres a great story in the game, it's actually perfect, i do recommend playing the first game (Portal) before playing this one.
Отличная игра что бы сделать из неандертальца, человека разумного.

Игра прикольная когда играете в кооперативе, для соло прохождения я бы не рекомендовал. Если хотите поломать себе голову и хорошенько подумать, то игра именно для вас!
Portal 2 is a very cheap game for its category and has a beautiful writen story, and great puzzles. I highly recommend it for a good single player game.
Both games (Portal and Portal 2) are amazing. The humor and atmosphere suck you in, and hours have passed before you even notice it. One of my favourite games to come out, ever.
9/10, -1 бал за довольно короткий хронометраж, и за малое количество уровней.

p.s.两部PORTAL加起来10.5买的，我是聪明逼！

This game is awesome! It has a great story, some super fun mechanics and some unique puzzles. The single player story mode for me was about 6-7 hours long, and the game has a really fun coop mode as well. It also has custom maps for both singleplayer & coop, so you'll be able to spend quite some time playing this game.

I definetely recommend you buy this game. I bought it during the Steam Summer Sale for just 1,63 euros, but I think I would've bought it for full price if I knew how awesome this was!
剧情，美术风格，玩儿法我都很喜欢

Everyone's already said it but, despite there being no options for turning off motion-blur, this game is an absolute masterpiece. If you don't care about the story of the games, just buy this one. There's nothing else to say about this work-of-art. It's just good. The puzzles are intriguing and they have elements from the first game. All around, just buy the game.
cant stop laughing when play w ma friend
This is just a lovely puzzle game. It has a nice little backstory that you get to figure out, which I found quite nice. There is no cake, however. :(
Great game. looks great. super fun.

Portal 2 is a sequel to the valve hit clasic portal, that introduced the portal mechanic .
This time you wake up after you destroyed GLaDOS and explore the abonded facility which nature has made it its property, if you like good jokes, intense action, and beeg brain puzzles i recommend this, i boght in a discount for 1,64 $ and if you find a better discount by it
断断续续玩了100多个小时 百玩不腻

Одна из самых лучших игр в жанре Головоломки, за такую цену просто шик, есть озвучка, сюжет и хорошие текстуры, которые не требуют мощного ПК. Однозначно рекомендую игру к покупке! А если возьмёте игру со скидкой, то считайте что она досталась вам бесплатно!

Game holds ups very nicely for the fact that it's very old. The voicework, art, and overall tone is one of my favorites that explores a futuristic or dystopian type of game and story. 10/10, would r8 again for sure.
Glados is kinda hot ngl would bang

Easily my favorite game of all time... I remember back when I had an ultra-crappy Windows XP PC and tried to use the shiftshader dll and other graphics hacks in order to make this game run on my computer. I was so enamored with simply being able to play this game. And then when I finally built my first computer, you can guess what the first thing I did was: set my desktop wallpaper to an Aperture Science one and play through Portal 2, and it did not disappoint. Wonderful story, memorable (and funny) characters, unique and challenging gameplay— this game is an instant classic and a must-play.
if you're a fan of thinking you will enjoy this

Игра хорошая, с выдающимся и интересным сюжетом. Я не побоюсь назвать эту игру одной из лучших в которые я играл. После прохождения одиночной игры, можно пройти кампанию с другом. Однозначно советую!!! Минус только один - она достаточно короткая, если вы вообще овощь игру можно пройти за 9 часов + -. а так она на часов 5-6 игры. Я про одиночную. А если с кооперотивом, то примерно за часов 15 пройти можно. не считал....
simple, amazing, and with a great sense of humor!

took 20 hours to beat the game twice, Have to say great game. but the ultimate betrayal will leave you sad and wishing things could have stayed in the good old days.

portal to the other side, die, find a new way, repeat

Loved portal 1, which was great because it introduced such a fun and unique mechanic, but portal 2 takes it to the next level, improving on story telling, length, quality of puzzles and other obstacles and tools by adding things like bridges, lasers, and surface altering gels. Valve really knocked this one out of the park, massive improvement on portal 1.
10/10 SPEND MONEY ON IT. IT IS A VERY GOOD GAME. (seriously though its one of my favorite games and is aton of fun I really recommend it)
